column4: I've installed ubuntu (i'm running the live CD now but i can mount the partition to edit files)... Now, when i boot up.. Grub error 18 initiated.. and nothing boots... I've googled previously ofcourse, and they say i need a small partition at the start of my HDD at location "/boot"
I have some questions on setting this up... can anyony offer to help ?
I've been at this for 9 hours now..
